values:
I shattered my clavicle back in April.
I didn't have insurance so the hospital didn't want to help me.
U.A.B.(yeah the super bad-ass surgical team) 
Has done two surgeries on my average fracture and still haven't fixed it.
Because if they don't have your money right away they would rather sue you and get it.
After the second surgery I wasn't able to work.
While I was recovering my roommates in Hoover move to FLA.
Taking my H.D. T.V. and the rest of my expensive belongings.
I get in touch with one of them and he says hes bringing the stuff back on the weekend.
Now no one answers my calls.
The Re-po man just took my car.
And my arm hurts so bad I don't sleep but 1 hour a night.
Everything I've worked for since I was 15 is gone now.
Erased. All I did when I was 15-last April was work for those things.
In four years I gained SO much.
In one I lost it all and even more.
My only friends abandoned me.
Whether it be because of drugs, alcoholism, or just more important things.     
My father abandoned me.
Just to go chase some pussy in another state so he can have his 'replacement' family.
And my big brother abandoned me.
The biggest role model 
throughout my childhood
throughout my life
Hangs himself in his back yard.

How the fuck am I supposed to feel about all this?
How am I supposed to feel?
If anyone reads this and knows how to help me 
for fucks sake let me know.

I have had that gun to my head.
I have had my finger on the trigger for so many years
but I can't fucking squeeze.
Something tells me not to give up to have hope.
But I have NEVER seen any proof.
I have NEVER seen any God.
I have never seen any happy endings.
All I can see is a world that spins off of apathy.
Monsters swallowing up the light of the world
and all innocent are being mangled in the crossfire.

Maybe if my music is loud enough I can ignore everything.
I guess that's all I really can do.

I never knew a pain like now.
It came one day and buried deeper and deeper every day.
The worst parts almost over.

Oh, Mary K, I can see her face
Down there in the waves, painted and erased
But I know it's just the reflection of the moon
A big fake resembling you.

too much Elliott Smith can make you crazy

I'm alone again
but I'm doing good
being more productive
getting shit taken care of
not sleeping well tho
depression keeps the sleep away.
I'm never fully awake
But I'm never fully asleep.
I'm hopeful
I'm alive
Don't have much to do tho...
Don't really have many friends
Kinda need to find a female somewhere
But then again not really
I'm working out a lot
nothing better to do
gained 15 pounds in one week 
By time I go out in public again I'll be a beast.
Its almost 9am and I've been laying in bed 
staring at the ceiling all night,
went and saw 'The Orphanage' with Elizabeth and some of her friends.
twas bad ass...
I need someone to hold on to
I feel too alone
now that I have my bullshit together I realize 
I have nothing to show for it
good god I need to get laid
maybe instead of working out so much :p

A lot has been going through my head
thinking about all the crazy shit, the fun shit,
Amari and I
watching that Mexican guy crush his head and die
I remember school and drugs
my youth seems like its only a dream
a dream that was wasted

Mehh 
I'll stop this pointless post
Ill read it in a year 
and hate myself for not being 
any better of a person.

Dreams are given to you 
when your young enough to dream em
before they do you any harm
They don't start to hurt
unless you try to hold on to em
after seeing what they really are

HAPPY NEW YEARS
Look back at all the failure
Look back at every time 
you took 2 steps then 4 back
Look at how much you have lost and how little gained
Now look at the years before
Can't remember the good ones can you?
Neither can I

07 Gaining nothing, losing all gained in. 04,05,06
06 Going nowhere Gaining little
05 Giving everything just to go nowhere
04 Realizing its gonna look bad soon

Now for 08
which road?
Move away from it all
all the nothing and all the memories
Of horror and joy
work my way up so I can go to school

Or stay
Find more work
work my way up
go to school
and deal with the nothing and shit
until I can handle anything
Or crumble because I can't handle anymore.

I often think of how much more I can take
I often think of how easy it would be to give up
But in order for me to see what I can take I can't give up

So my only reason to live is to see how bad life can be
Fuck everything 
Fuck everyone 
Fuck me 
Fuck the world 
Fuck politics 
Fuck religion
Fuck life
Fuck love

well ok I don't believe in "love" 
But I do believe in love/respect/warmth/security
Only proofs of love

I don't have that
but the want for it 
makes me want to stay alive
just the idea of stability
even false stability is still nice....




On that note why do I always get on LJ 
when I'm suuuuuuper fucked up.

End Transmission .

I fucked up the only relationship 
Ive been in in the past couple of years 
because I wanted to take it slow instead of 
rushing in and fucking it up
Ive been fucking dwelling on my brother and staying depressed
so long that it fucked up the only comfort I have.
Now that I notice it, I'm sure its too late
I'm sooo fucking tired of being the friend
I'm really god damn sick of almost every girl I know telling me 
how perfect I am and how they wish they could have a guy like me
yeah a guy LIKE me
but NEVER me 
This has by far been the worst year of my life
Its taken me months to get the image of Kevin hanging from a tree
out of my head and now I can tell that I'm better 
but the only thing it was effecting has passed
Every time I look at my revolver I think maybe I should just finish it
But come Jan. If things don't look up I'm moving back to Atlanta
And if that falls through again Its over for me
I am not going to waste another year of my life thinking maybe next year things will look up, 
because its only gotten worse.

I hope someone will pop up and change my mind around
but I doubt anyone gives a fuck

Yes Indeed
I'm alone again
and here comes emptiness
crashing in

This sucks

happy birthday Kevin
I guess I don't need to pick you up today...

fuck it I'm not looking at LJ anymore...
its fucking depressing

but I need some help...I need someone
I dont know how to act...how to feel
my brother killed himself last night
I havent slept yet
Holding my mom all night stoking her hair
holding my sister trying to make their pain go away
....I dont know anymore

I give up...if there is a God
Fuck him

if your fucking God loves you so much 
maybe he'll stop tearing your world down

Im sorry but all I have is hate now
no one is here
just hate
no love
just hate

I think that Ive been down for so long 
I don't want to come back
There is a point when you quit looking to the top from the bottom
and learn to be comfortable with the bottom
when the only way to be happy
is to be sad because its what your so accustom to
you learn to enjoy what you have
but when all you have is emptiness
to try and fill it is almost painful
all the past times of trying your best all the way too the end
just to be knocked back down
leaves me with this fear of failing 

Ive been knocked off my own two feet
and Ive pulled myself back up
Just to have my legs broken
Ive scrambled back on them 
Just to land in broken glass
So why keep fighting gravity?
How long should I refuse to go down
Before it kills me.




sometimes I think I'm losing my mind
but I think its already gone

god damn it people are fucking idiots
my friends house got raided and they found 68 pot plants and over $38,000 in cash
fucking idiots
im pretty sure he'll get off if his roommate takes the blame but still...


On another note my brother is locked up again
gonna be in for a long time this time
fuck it

reallllly wanna get shitty soon

Now I wonder what it is you're after
Keeping company with this disaster
Random bliss is pushing out my Rage/Depression
Is still in the blood I guess...

well been 2 days...haven't smoked anything!

one a day vitamins kick ass

huzzah I feel healthy already

Ive never sat at work for the entire day wanting to go get cigarettes until tonight

Here is the deal
Little Drink
little less smoking
no more weed
no more pills
no video games....(those are the worst)

I work all the time but I'm not getting money saved up
So there it is
clean slate
almost

Oh and more trips to Atlanta
I almost forgot how to have enjoyment

Nothing is worth the sleep that I've lost
Apologies unacceptable now
A blistered revenge awaits in me
This is fucking loveless

"Music is worth doing just because. It doesn't have to be justified by some political point
of view, and it's kind of insulting to the music to make it a tool for something else."
- Elliott Smith

I straight
I won't crack
on my way
and I can't turn back
I'm okay
I'm on track
on my way
and I can't turn back
I stayed
on this track
gone too far
and I can't come back
I stayed
on this track
lost my way
can't come back

fuck

86 LJ its never helped for anything
im just gonna keep working all the time make some mad money then leave
fuck everyone
fuck everything ive earned and fuck everything ive left behind.

that is all

Theres got to be something else
The blame I place on myself
Behind tired eyes
The demon's stir
The tears go un-cried

Angels on the sideline,
Puzzled and amused.
Why did Father give these humans free will?
Now they're all confused.



Fight over the clouds, over wind, over sky
Fight over your lie, over blood, over anything
Fight over love, over sun, over nothing
Fight till they die,


over what? 
for their ending

Well an old man with a shriner jacket ruined my week/month/year/life

"You havin' a good day today sir?"

"Nope Horrible"

"...well any day to be alive cant be all too bad."

"You think that now, Just wait..."

every equivalent to anything is really zero because nothing last forever

not even 'Pi' (Math lies)

What is existence?

A word thought up to make us feel like more than we are maybe...?
____________________________________________________________________

On the bright side all it takes is one word to a certain person 
to change their life forever and I guess thats why I still post in here


Shower time
I get a diploma in the mail within the next 8 weeks

Ive been trying hard to stay nice and calm/happy lately

BUT
LIFE IS SHIT NOTHING BUT SHIT
Ive been trying to mold this life (shit) into castles...

But its still shit

I was starting to believe that the idea of the phoenix 
could be used to describe life
and that something beautiful could rise from the ashes

well...Im cant breathe the ashes are in my lungs and im still buried

At this point all I want to do is lay in bed and never wake up
Life is so much better when your asleep

Im surrounded by such insanity all the time its not even 
surprising how fucking crazy my ENTIRE family is

For example I got back from taking my brother back to Tuscaloosa
my mom is sitting at the table looking at some paper...
with a gun sitting beside her folders

(her being completely fucked up out of her mind on ambien)

"I kept hearing breathing from behind me so I got the gun out"

(me)

"Thats nice, Im going to bed, goodnight."


Oh and on another note
I give my mom around $150 or $200 a week to help with bills
and were about to be kicked out of our house
so If anyone wants to get an apartment with me it would be nice
I dont think I can afford one alone

and I havent had a reason to be...
for a looooong time

but I guess I just dont care anymore
Ive become VERY straight forward

no telling how many people ive told to fuck off lately

FUCK IT

live hard, die fast, Fuck the bullshit.

(not literally thats gross)
Unless your into that

If you have cingular
can you look on your billing statement and find a number that texted you
my phone clears them out every few days and I forgot to save one...

If you aint balsac 
you aint shit.

Random... I decide to up and go see GWAR without even planning it.
And it rocked my ass

ITS EVERYWHERE
ITS IN MY RACCOON WOUNDS


Ok time to wash all of the blood and seamen off me

This is the plan

Leave TPXXXXX scratch that one they gave me more money
Start getting certified with ken so I can be a plumber on the week days.

go get my GED in Jan.

Get into school with the mad money ill be making

Thats about $400 a week with one job and about 
200 a week with the other.

Thats what a calculated discarding taxes...

OK
the plan is set,
maybe nothing will fuck this one up

Why does life keep sucking
why cant I keep it built up anymore
I feel like pulling the wings off an angel 
and poking its useless form.

I sick of this emptiness and even more so sick of this life,
Im to busy for friends and 
my family makes me want to put a knife in my chest.

I smoked pot like a week ago and my family thinks ive been doing/selling crack....

PSH YEAH
Me, WHO FUCKING OVERDOSES OF ENERGY DRINKS AND CAFFEINE PILLS.

I miss everyone but I dont know how to act around people because 
Im so used to being isolated (other than at work)
Which im not even going to talk about my job, Just put it this way,
Domino's cut me + before I got hours + no job + Go back to TP + New GM promisses money just cuts hours = STILL FUCKING BROKE.
Add all this together Im staying busy and tired, and not making enough to pay my bills, so everyone thinks im on drugs.

I cant even argue anymore, 
Ive been going along for years now saying "Every dog has his day"

I wanna go find a girlfriend and quit partying, but now days even the ones that seem sweet and smart are either gonna use you or forget you.
or cheat.
 I dont understand cheating, Ive been cheated on with a girl I didnt even sleep with. (too bad for her)
And It sucks thinking there is someone out there that offer better than you.

Shit im not great to look at....and im not dumb enough to keep rambling like this.

You know, there's a million fine looking women in the world, dude. 
But they don't all bring you lasagna at work. 
Most of 'em just cheat on you.
Thats all I have to say at this point.

I started back at TP tonight...
I also found out the biggest role model in my family died halloween night.
He was old but I looked up to him more than most the people Ive ever known.

I think Im going to NOLA soon for the funeral.
Im way too addicted to Xbox Live...
Has it really been 4 days it seems like one long one.

Of no sleep...
In a house with nothing to do...

whats wrong with me

Wow its been a while...

I had to remember like 100 different passwords today...

needs to go out and kill one thing...then tally the odds.





fuck everything

I thought the dark times would blow by


::BUZZ::

Wrong.

I was going to go back to hewitt this year but


fuck that.

Yeaaaah saw Slayer
Fuckin awesome
...from now on im gonna sit around and spend money on pointless shit...
fuck everyone and everything im better off just me.

Oh yeah dont call me, if you havent talked to me since i moved because i dont want friends






......maybe im winning

Hey Im off tomorrow...someone call me
I get tired of saying that cause it never happens

but hey Im going to fuckin SLAYER Tues.


yay


....I need internet

If anyone lives in Argo and wants to do anything call me im going crazy!



# is below

I have no cable or internet.
call if you want to keep in touch, otherwise, whatever.

706-6290


'and now its just another lonely day'

A woman has a close male friend. 
This means that he is probably interested in her, 
which is why he hangs around so much. 
She sees him strictly as a friend. 
This always starts out with, 
you're a great guy, 
but I don't like you in that way. 
This is roughly the equivalent for the guy of going to a job interview 
and the company saying, 
You have a great resume, 
you have all the qualifications we are looking for, 
but we're not going to hire you. 
We will, however, 
use your resume as the basis for comparison for all other applicants. 
But, we're going to hire somebody who is far less qualified 
and is probably an alcoholic. 
And if he doesn't work out, 
we'll hire somebody else, 
but still not you. 
In fact, we will never hire you. 
But we will call you from time to time to complain about the person that we hired.


I love bash.org

Ummmm we were supposed to move last wed... then Friday....now Monday.
And knowing how crazy my mom is I dont think we are moving I think shes just trying to convince herself she is because any day now my step dad can sell our house from under us and well be homeless...

So Im looking for an apartment if anyone wants to go in with me...

I really am uncertain about all these changing dates
And the fact Ive only seen 'our' new house once when it wasn't finished being built...

But hell, 
right now Im just throwing that out there because 
she fucks around at critical times and now Im a little worried.

Oh well at least were not in Atlanta this time if its true.

Its a picture perfect evening and Im staring down the sun
Fully loaded deaf and dumb and done
Waiting for sedation to disconnect my head
Or any situation where Im better off then dead...

EDIT :

Spent last night roaming around the city by myself to clear my head.
It was good for me I guess.
I realized im leaving the valley this week...

and WOW the valley is why I have balls, 
its why i can walk through a crackhouse and not think twice, 
why I dont fear physical pain anymore....
alot of memories about to be left behind in this house
Alot of blood, sweat and tears....the only good thing is the lessons ive learned.

Im really lonely but I dont want to be around friends

I need something else

I havent been sleeping much lately...
that may be a big part of why i feel this way...
I dont know... Fuck it, im gonna go for a walk.
